description: This source file implements the advanced functions of the BbhmDiagipSink object, including buffer retrieval, accept, receive, close, and abort functionalities related to a ping sink in a network diagnostic context. It interacts with socket objects and handles network data reception and socket management.

methods.name: PVOID BbhmDiagipSinkGetRecvBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PANSC_HANDLE phRecvHandle,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves the receive buffer and its size for the sink object, used when data is to be received.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagipSinkAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hNewSocket)
methods.description: Handles the acceptance of a new socket connection and creates a new sink object. Contains a bug where it incorrectly frees the newly created sink object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagipSinkRecv(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRecvHandle,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Handles incoming data received on the socket, forwarding it to the diagnostic object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagipSinkClose(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bByPeer)
methods.description: Closes the sink, resetting its state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagipSinkAbort(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Handles critical network failure, aborting the sink.
